contract_details.description: Implement comprehensive data deduplication strategies to eliminate redundant data storage, optimize database performance, and ensure data consistency across all swarm data systems.
contract_details.background: Data duplication across multiple databases and storage systems has led to increased storage costs, slower query performance, and potential data inconsistency issues throughout the swarm infrastructure.
objectives: Analyze all data storage systems for duplication patterns and inefficiencies
Implement data deduplication algorithms and normalization strategies
Create unified data schema and eliminate redundant data structures
Establish data quality monitoring to prevent future duplications
Optimize database queries and indexing for improved performance
Implement automated data cleanup and maintenance procedures
deliverables: Comprehensive data duplication analysis report with storage savings projections
Unified data schema design with normalized structures
Automated data deduplication system with configurable rules
Data quality monitoring dashboard with real-time metrics
Database optimization recommendations and implemented improvements
Automated data maintenance and cleanup procedures
technical_requirements: Data analysis and ETL tools (Pandas, Apache Spark, Airflow)
Data quality and profiling tools (Great Expectations, Deequ)
Database optimization tools and query analyzers
Monitoring and alerting systems for data quality
success_criteria: Data storage reduced by 40%+ through deduplication
Unified data schema implemented across all systems
Automated data quality monitoring catching 95%+ issues
Data consistency maintained across all swarm components
Automated maintenance procedures reducing manual intervention by 80%

dependencies: Database inventory and data mapping completed
Data access patterns and usage analysis finished
Data quality assessment and profiling tools available
Backup and recovery procedures for data migration established
resources_required: Data profiling and quality assessment platforms

network_unlocks: Access to Data Architecture Working Group

contract_history.details: Contract auto-generated from Data Storage & Processing Deduplication template
